title: Katie Holmes ditches the red carpet glamour for her sweatshirt and jeans
text:
She enjoyed a glamorous night on the town with her mother just hours earlier.

But Katie Holmes took things down a notch on Thursday.

The actress, 40, took a jaunt through New York City wearing a baggy grey sweatshirt and loose jeans.

No red carpet glam today! Katie Holmes took a jaunt through New York City wearing a baggy grey sweatshirt and loose jeans

Katie opted to bring out her natural beauty with hardly a stitch of makeup upon her radiant complexion.

She wore her brunette tresses down, allowing them to billow out in their loose, usual waves.

From her lace-up leather shoes to her sweatshirt, Katie was the picture of casual style for the day.

However, she did jazz up the look with a leopard print cross body purse.

Wild thing: The star jazzed up her laid-back look with a leopard print cross body purse

Katie appeared in good spirits as she enjoyed some time to herself.

The Dawson's Creek actress did not appear to be joined by her teen daughter Suri Cruise, who she shares with her ex-husband Tom Cruise.

Though hours earlier she was enjoying some quality time with her mother Kathleen.

Throwing shade: She protected her eyesight with a large pair of sunglasses

Family time! Holmes attended the American Ballet Theater gala at the Lincoln Center with her mother Kathleen on Wednesday night

The pair attended the American Ballet Theater gala at the Lincoln Center together, where Katie dazzled in a rustic orange dress with coordinating coat.

Kathleen opted for a flowing white blouse, sparkling footwear, and a slew of jewelry.

Katie, meanwhile, is newly single after the end of her long-term relationship with Jamie Foxx.

It emerged the couple had went their separate ways over the summer.

Katie and Jamie were first romantically linked back in 2013, following her divorce from Tom.
description: The actress, 40, ditched the red carpet style for a grey sweatshirt and baggy jeans during a jaunt through New York. Katie opted to bring out her natural beauty with hardly a stitch of makeup.
